author: Walt Disney
text: The only way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Audrey Hepburn
text: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!

author: Alexander the Great
text: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.

author: Michael Altshuler
text: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
text: Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow.

author: Albert Einstein
text: We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.

author: Winston Churchill
text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Henry David Thoreau
text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

author: Dorothy West
text: To know how much there is to know is the beginning of learning to live.

author: Will Rogers
text: Dont let yesterday take up too much of today.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: George Eliot
text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

author: Nelson Mandela
text: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Muhammad Ali
text: Dont count the days, make the days count.

author: Toni Morrison
text: Definitions belong to the definers, not the defined.

author: Bruce Springsteen
text: When it comes to luck, you make your own.

author: Oscar Wilde
text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.

author: Duke Ellington
text: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.

author: Walt Disney
text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Billie Jean King
text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.

author: Jim Rohn
text: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

author: H. G. Wells
text: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

author: Dalai Lama
text: In order to carry a positive action we must develop a positive mindset.

author: Martha Beck
text: Everyday brings new choices.
